mapper.select: select * from inc_v_invoice t where t.open_id = #{openId} and t.status = #{status} order by t.is_default, t.modify_time
select * from inc_v_invoice t where t.id = #{id}
select * from inc_enterprise t where t.credit_code = #{creditCode}
mapper.insert: insert into inc_invoice (open_id, type, user_name, credit_code, create_time, modify_time, is_default, status, phone, email) values (#{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into inc_invoice
id,
open_id,
type,
user_name,
credit_code,
create_time,
modify_time,
is_default,
status,
phone,
email,

mapper.update:
update inc_invoice
OPEN_ID = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_CODE = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE id = #{id}

update inc_invoice set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_code = #{creditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id}
